name: Lock and Roll
description:
-WASD Keys to move-
-Space to Jump-
-J to Dash-

In Lock and Roll, you have limited jumps and dashes. Use power- ups to regain jumps, but be careful, once at 0 jumps or dashes you cannot recover any more. The green battery represents jumps, while the red shows dashes. This was a quick game for the game jam: My First Game Jam Jan 2021. Music and sounds as well as some levels were made by SaxonWolcott. Hope you enjoy!
